abstract: The military contractor says that by building the craft itself, it hopes to avoid some of the problems that hampered the previous contractors.
snippet: The military contractor says that by building the craft itself, it hopes to avoid some of the problems that hampered the previous contractors.
lead_paragraph: Boeing plans to announce on Monday that it will enter the bidding to build a fleet of presidential helicopters, adding a major new player to a project the Pentagon is trying to revive after President Obama criticized it last year as contracting “gone amok.”

headline.main: Boeing Plans Bid on Presidential Helicopter Fleet
headline.print_headline: Boeing Plans Bid on Presidential Helicopter Fleet
